name: s2fv1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs2(c2, c0), nat1), c0))

stmt.origin: cats1fvn(c0, c1, cs2(c2, c0), nat1, cs1(c2))
stmt.pretty: cats1fvn(c0, c1, <" c2 . c0 ">, nat1, <" c2 ">)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs2(c2, c0), nat1), c0))
-| wceq(cs2(c2, c0), co(cs1(c2), cconcat, cs1(c0)))
-| wcel(cs1(c2), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c2)), nat1)

cumulated.origin:

-| wceq(cs2(c2, c0), co(cs1(c2), cconcat, cs1(c0)))
-| wcel(cs1(c2), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c2)), nat1)

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs2(c2, c0), nat1), c0))
-| wcel(cs1(c2), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c2)), nat1)

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs2(c2, c0), nat1), c0))
-| wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c2)), nat1)
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs2(c2, c0), nat1), c0))
